title: The Mercenary Company Elite Long Sleeve Combat Shirt 2019 Edition
features: Elite Combat shirt with stain- / oil- / water- repellent Teflon treatment - 65/35 NYCO rip-stop fabric sleeves and collar - stretch fabric chest and back
1/4 zip front, fold down mandarin collar, upper arm pockets, hook & loop cuffs
Reinforced elbows with internal pockets for elbow pads (pads sold separately)
Matching Elite Combat Pants also available

Chest sizing: SMALL - 41" / MEDIUM - 43" / LARGE- 45" / XL- 47" / XXL- 49" / XXXL- 51" - Combat shirts are cut in a slimmer fit for athletic builds. Those desiring extra room and/or a looser fit should order one size up. Chest size is true-to-inch inch measurement.
